lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin igAwn igAwn Avgwhn kY kotin kotwin iDAwn iDAwn aur DwrhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Giaan Giaan Avagaahan Kai , Kotani Kotaani Dhiaan Dhiaan Ur Dhaarahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: For searching the words of True Guru, millions keep the knowledge and contemplation of the Guru in their mind.

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin ismrn ismrn kir kotin kotwin aunmwn bwrMbwr hI
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Simaran Simaran Kari , Kotani Kotaani Ounamaan Baaranbaar Hee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: For acquiring the vastness of Guru's perception and contemplation, millions of meditation methods of repeating/ reciting/uttering the words of the Guru are adopted.

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin suriq sbd Aau diRsit kY kotin kotwin rwg nwd Junkwr hI
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Surati Sabad Au Drisati Kai , Kotani Kotaani Raag Naad Jhounakaar Hee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of hearing powers try to perceive the divine word of Guru. Millions of singing modes are playing melodious tunes before the enchanting notes of Gur Shabad (Guru's words).

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin pRym nym gur sbd kau nyq nyq nmo nmo kY nmskwr hI ]146]
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Praym Naym Gur Sabad Kau , Nayt Nayt Namo Namo Kai Namasakaar Hee ?146?

Shabad OS B.translation: Abiding by many codes of love and discipline, millions salute the words of the True Guru repeatedly calling it infinite, infinite and beyond. (146)
